name: あさひ
trans: Hmm...

name: 愛依
text: あれ、あそこにいるのって……
trans: Huh? Isn't that──

name: あさひ
trans: Hmm...

name: 愛依
text: あさひちゃーん、何してんの～
trans: Asahi, what are you doing there?

name: 愛依
text: あさひちゃんってば～
trans: Hey, Asahi!

name: あさひ
text: あ！　愛依ちゃん、こんなところで何してるんすか？
trans: Ah, Mei! What are ya doing at a place like this?

name: 愛依
text:
え～、それあさひちゃんが言っちゃう～？
マジ、こっちのセリフなんですけど～
trans:
Eh? You sure you should be saying that?
Like, that's totally my line!

name: あさひ
text: ……この色、どうやったら出るんすかね……
trans: Just how does this color turn out like that?

name: 愛依
text:
って、もう聞いてないし
あ～、そのマネキンのカツラか～
trans:
Aaand you're not listening anymore.
Oh, and now you're talking about the mannequin's wig, huh～

name: あさひ
text:
そっす！　なんか愛依ちゃんの髪みたいで
綺麗じゃないっすか！
trans: Yup! It's so pretty, just like your hair, Mei!

name: 愛依
text:
え～、めっちゃ嬉しいこと言ってくれるじゃん
あさひちゃん
trans: You sure say the nicest things, Asahi.

name: 愛依
text: このこの～
trans: You little angel, you～

name: あさひ
text: あはは
trans: Ahaha...

name: 愛依
text:
うりうり～……
つか……あれ？　なんの話だっけ？
trans:
Thanks～
Hmm? Say... what were we talking about again?

name: あさひ
text: 髪の色の話っすよ！
trans: The color of the hair!

name: 愛依
text:
あ、そーだったね～
でもさ、どうしてそんな気になんの？
trans:
Oh, right.
But why are you interested in it?

name: あさひ
text: わたしもやってみたいんすよ！
trans: I wanna try it for myself!

name: 愛依
text:
え～、絶対やめた方がいいよ～
あさひちゃんは今のが可愛いし
trans:
Huh? You should definitely give up on that idea.
You're plenty cute as you are right now.

name: 愛依
text:
それにさ、このグラデはかなり脱色しないと出ないし
髪のダメージヤバいことになるよ？
trans: Besides, with this kind of gradient hair color, you really have to bleach it right if you want to pull it off. And that'll damage your hair really bad anyways.

name: あさひ
text: そういうもんっすかね～
trans: So... that's how it works.

name: 愛依
text: そーいうもん
trans: That's right!

name: あさひ
text: ……じゃあ、やめるっす！
trans: Then I'll give up on that idea!

name: あさひ
text: あ！　愛依ちゃん、あっちにもなんかあるっすよ！
trans: Look, Mei! Seems like something's over there!

name: 愛依
text: ちょ、あさひちゃん！
trans: Hey, Asahi!

name: あさひ
text: ほら～、早く来るっすよ～！
trans: Come on, catch up already!

name: 愛依
text:
早いって～
すぐ行くから、ちょい待ち～！
trans:
Catch up, you say...
I'll be right there, so just wait a sec!
